growthexperiments-quit-mentorship-has-me: Ntibishimishije kubona {{Uburinganire:|wowe}} kuba.wareka inama , {{Uburinganire:|wowe}} ukeneye kuzuza urupapuro rukurikira wamara kurutanga, abajanama bawe bose bazahindurwa bashya. ibi kandi ntago bishobora guhinduka. niba {{uburinganire:|wowe}} ukeneye akaruhuko k'ubujyanama, ahubwo tekereza kukuvugurura ibikuranga muburyo buhambaye cyangwa ugabanye umubare wabo uha inama. {{uburinganire:|wowe}} wakora izo minduka kuri {{uburinganire:|yawe}} [[Special:MentorDashboard|Mentor dashboard settings]].
